text: It can be but it costs :moneybag:

Hey there, I created the filtered box, So if I click any box it will filter data accordingly and giving the result. But after that checkbox unchecked automatically. So I am not able to apply multiple filter(using multiple checkbox). Does anyone help me?  Putting my code in thread.

how can I get alert message in HubL?
want whole querystring in alert

You would want to code out an alert message (not sure how you are making the alert happen) but then with HubL you would want to look for `{{request.query_dict}}` or even `{{Query}}`. You may also have to loop through them if you are looking to get a certain layout to show.
but there isnt anything that is going to make an alert in hubl.  you will need js for that
